definitions.definition: A physical image or representation of a deity , person , or thing .
examples: a simulacrum of a New York studio apartment

definitions.definition: A thing which has the appearance or form of another thing, but not its true qualities ; a thing which simulates another thing; an imitation , a semblance .

main_definition: A physical image or representation of a deity , person , or thing .
secondary_definitions: A thing which has the appearance or form of another thing, but not its true qualities ; a thing which simulates another thing; an imitation , a semblance .
